tech.barbero.http.message.signing.servlet

Class SignatureHeaderVerifierServletFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.barbero.http.message.signing.servlet.SignatureHeaderVerifierServletFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class SignatureHeaderVerifierServletFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    A simple servlet filter that send an HTTP 401 unauthorized status code if the signature is not recognized.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignatureHeaderVerifierServletFilter(SignatureHeaderVerifier signatureVerifier)
      Creates a new SignatureHeaderVerifierServletFilter which will check HTTP request signatures with the given signatureVerifier.
